title: Practice Challenge
description: Create: 1. Horizontal scrolling category chips (Wrap or Row) 2. Vertical product list 3. Pull-to-refresh functionality ---
instructions: Create: 1. Horizontal scrolling category chips (Wrap or Row) 2. Vertical product list 3. Pull-to-refresh functionality ---

hints.text: Horizontal ListView needs SizedBox with height, add scrollDirection: Axis.horizontal
RefreshIndicator wraps ListView - onRefresh must return Future<void>

commonMistakes.consequence: Unbounded height error - ListView doesn't know how tall to be

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to wrap ListView in Expanded inside Column
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap ListView in Expanded when inside Column
